title: "Exercise II"
author: "Ulf Schepsmeier"
date: "12 Mai 2016"
output: html_document
---

1. Write down (on a paper) the R-vine tree sequence given the following R-Vine Matrix:
$$
\begin{pmatrix}
 6 \\
 2 & 5 \\
 3 & 2 & 4 \\
 4 & 3 & 2 & 3 \\
 1 & 4 & 3 & 2 & 2 \\
 5 & 1 & 1 & 1 & 1 & 1\\
 \end{pmatrix}
$$
2. Check your results by plotting the R-vine with `plot()` or `RVineTreePlot()`. Therefore create an R-Vine Matrix object (RVM). For simplicity use only Gaussian copulas with random correlation parameter rho.  

You may use the function `RVineMatrixCheck` to validate your R-vine matrix.
See `?RvineMatrixCheck` for help.
